description: Update Next.js Link component usage across frontend to align with Next.js 15 best practices

workstreams.description: Analyze codebase for Link component patterns
Fix Navigation.tsx to use href instead of to prop
Verify all other Link usages are correct
Validate all changes and report results

decisions.decision: Found 3 instances in Navigation.tsx using React Router 'to' prop instead of Next.js 'href' prop
Updated all 3 instances to use 'href' prop, maintaining all other props and functionality
Verified TypeScript compilation passes with no errors in modified files
